STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Monitor and Gain Insights into New Transactions
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_1: Our platform leverages cutting-edge AI technology to provide deep insights into new Ethereum transactions as they occur on the blockchain.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_2: We analyze transaction data, smart contract interactions, and on-chain activity to detect anomalies, fraud, and potential security risks.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_3: Stay ahead of the curve with our real-time alerts and comprehensive analytics dashboards.
FOOTER_COMPONENT_1_BODY_TEXT_4: Protect your investments and make informed decisions with our advanced transaction monitoring solution.

LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: New feature: Analyze live Ethereum transactions!
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Gain valuable insights into the latest activity on the Ethereum blockchain. Monitor, track, and dissect transactions as they occur.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with our advanced Ethereum transaction analysis engine. Receive instant notifications and insights on new transactions as they occur on the blockchain.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Leverage our powerful analytics tools to gain deep insights into transaction patterns, trends, and anomalies. Identify potential risks and opportunities with ease.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Tailor our alerting system to your specific needs. Set custom thresholds and rules to receive targeted alerts for transactions that matter most to your business.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Our platform seamlessly integrates with your existing systems and workflows, ensuring a smooth and efficient analysis process for your Ethereum transactions.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Trust in our robust security measures and redundant infrastructure to ensure your transaction data remains safe and accessible at all times.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Our dedicated team of blockchain experts is available to assist you with any questions or concerns, ensuring you get the most out of our transaction analysis capabilities.
HERO_TEXT_BEFORE_TITLE: Real-time insights into Ethereum blockchain activity.

CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Gain valuable insights into new Ethereum transactions as they happen.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Ethereum Transaction Analysis App
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app allows you to analyze new Ethereum transactions in real-time. It provides insights into transaction details, gas fees, and potential security risks.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We connect directly to the Ethereum blockchain and monitor the mempool for new transactions. Advanced algorithms then analyze each transaction for potential issues or anomalies.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely. We never store your private keys or wallet data. All analysis happens off-chain using just the public transaction data.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Gain valuable insights before confirming transactions. Identify potential scams, hacks or front-running attacks. Make smarter decisions when using Ethereum.
CTA_BODY: Gain valuable insights into the latest Ethereum transactions as they occur. Our app provides in-depth analysis and monitoring capabilities to help you stay ahead of the curve.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Unlock the Power of Ethereum Transaction Data
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to commonly asked questions about our Ethereum transaction analysis app.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app provides real-time analysis of new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain. It monitors the network, identifies new transactions as they occur, and applies advanced analytics to extract valuable insights.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What kind of insights can I get?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: The app analyzes transaction details like sender, recipient, value transferred, gas fees, and smart contract interactions. It can detect patterns, anomalies, and trends to help you better understand Ethereum activity.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How quickly are new transactions analyzed?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Our system is designed for near real-time analysis. New transactions are typically picked up within seconds of being included in a new Ethereum block.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I integrate this app with my own tools?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely. We provide APIs and webhooks that allow you to easily integrate our transaction analysis capabilities into your own applications, dashboards, or alerting systems.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We offer a free tier for basic usage, as well as paid plans with more advanced features and higher data allowances. Visit our pricing page for full details on the available options.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Monitor and analyze new transactions on the Ethereum blockchain as they occur with our powerful analytics engine.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Set up custom alerts to be notified of specific transaction patterns, large transfers, or activity from watched addresses.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Gain insights through intuitive charts and graphs that visualize transaction flows, token movements, and on-chain activity.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Stay ahead of the game with real-time analysis of new Ethereum transactions. Powered by cutting-edge technology for unparalleled insights.
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it. Hear from developers who use our Ethereum transaction analysis platform.
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: EthAnalytics has been a game-changer for our dApp. The real-time transaction insights allow us to monitor user activity and optimize our smart contracts.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: With EthAnalytics, we can easily track and analyze new Ethereum transactions as they happen. It's an invaluable tool for our security auditing process.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The transaction data from EthAnalytics has allowed us to build powerful visualizations and insights for our investor community. Highly recommended!
